body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/m3kRA-aqkq8wa6G0KHkkaoiOJbc9b6Hn7dlok9VNIOlq*Kl92cYENy3m7wiZpzEmgnsUWbn0uu4ib1g265E9EPUH86crYtIs/hbquestion.jpg) Hi guys, Can't run HB because of this. I sought out and installed... OpenStudio-1.5.0.2dc18ed8f5-Windows.exe ...but it didn't solve the problem.
topic: Problem with HB because of missing OpenStudioStandardsFile

replies.body: Hi Rob, We are recently experiencing download issues. You can download all the files from this link as a .zip file and manually extract it to Ladybug folder: ([https://app.box.com/s/bh9sbpgajdtmmystv3n4](https://app.box.com/s/bh9sbpgajdtmmystv3n4)). [](http://api.ning.com/files/E6-J*b1OZQNBtTaSA3kYA2ewgPl6XjGBtPPN1DFr6sGQegB8g*jtT5NhZSZd9PomumShRAF3ji1W90FBgF8MuhWG1e-lOz6m/ladybug_defaultFolder.png) You can find ladybug default folder by checking the output of Ladybug_Ladybug component. It should be c:\ladybug or C:\Users\%USERNAME%\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug depending on your user permissions.
